wordpressPost.title: Join us in Redefining the Good Life at Sustainable Brands
wordpressPost.content:
This coming week Sustainable Brands is hosting their keystone event, The Sustainable Brands Conference in Detroit, MI. This year’s theme is all about Redefining the Good Life. Read to find out how you can be a part of this global initiative and where you can meet a couple members of the WeSpire team!

This year’s Sustainable Brands conference will include the launch of a global initiative that looks at how people’s passions and values are transforming how companies deliver and communicate value to their customers. With over 2,000 attendees and forward thinking organizations under one roof, we are looking forward to the thought-provoking sessions, conversations, and positive takeaways that will come out of the event.
On Thursday, May 25th at 9 am ET, Susan will be sharing our own research on the ROI of Purposeful Leadership, Consumer Trust, and Employee Engagement for Sustainability.
Alongside leaders from Sustainable Brands, Edelman, and The Center for Positive Organizations, this session will dive into the real business value of employee engagement, purpose and leadership. Each panelist will share insights from their own research, and provide tangible takeaways to help other organizations prove the business value of these impactful programs.
We look forward to seeing many of you there and would love the opportunity to discuss how we can help you make the case for implementing positive business programs at your organization.
Reach out to us at info@wespire.com if you are interested in setting up some time to speak during Sustainable Brands.
